casebody.data:
Russell Joseph PERRONE
v.
Shawn W. ROGERS Russell J. Perrone, Individually, and as Provisional Administrator of the Succession of Randall William Perrone, Russell J. Perrone, John J. Perrone and Deborah H. Perrone
v.
Shawn W. Rogers Deborah H. Perrone and John J. Perrone, Jr.
v.
Shawn W. Rogers NO. 2018-C-0101 Supreme Court of Louisiana. March 2, 2018 Denied. HUGHES, J., would grant.
